title: NORTH IS JUST NOT FOR THE TAMILS ALONE, WHEN NO PART OF THE COUNTRY HAS RACIAL JURISDICTION
content: Onlanka News – by Dr. Telli C Rajaratnam COMMANDER IN CHIEF OF THE ARMED FORCES PRESIDENT RAJAPAKSA AUTHORIZED THE MILITARY STRATEGIES OF DEFENCE SECRETARY GOTABHAYA RAJAPAKSA TO RESCUE THE INHABITANTS OF THE NORTH THE IMMINENT NECESSITY FOR MILITARY PRESENCE  IN THE INTERESTS OF THE INHABITANTS OF THE NORTH Liberated North We have just liberated the…
